channel.title: Comments on: Green Roofs – The ultimate water recycler

item.title: By: ARTEZANOS

item.description: WE HAVE A VERY INFORMATIVE VIDEO ON HOW TO CONSTRUCT A SUSTAINABLE GREEN ROOF WITH PRE-VEGETATED MATS OF ORNAMENTAL HORTICULTURE OVER SLOPED RESIDENTIAL TRADITIONAL ROOFING UTILIZING A LIGHT WEIGHT HYBRID ARCHITECTURAL ROOF TILE DESIGN. THE SYSTEM IS FLORIDA AND DADE COUNTY APPROVED AND IS THE FIRST OF ITS KIND. http://www.artezanos.com/green_universal_hybrid_roof_tile_system.html
